item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: "Hello, friend?" That's lame. Maybe I should give you a name?

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome! Hi there! I’m Chris Thwaites, a technical artist & animator within the video game industry. I love all things code, art and problem solving. I’m currently working on 3D Rendering Applications outside of working hours, learning more about application architecture, animation and graphics programming. I love contributing towards projects and helping out where I can! All views here are my own and do not reflect my employer’s. Please feel free to reach out via :
